items.preText: Damith: "Great to see the typical old SL tempo is back. Confidence is the key to success of last 2 matches and thanks to Hathurusinghe boys are rising up!!!"

items.text: back of a length outside off, tries to defend but takes the inside edge between bat and pad. How did that miss off stump? Goes just over it

items.preText: Firoz: "I won't be so sure to give this to Sri Lanka yet. There's still Shakib and Mashrafe in the shed who can hit some lusty blows if these two manage to bat until the 40th over"
items.text: back of a length outside off, dances down the wicket and smacks this over the bowler's head. Dispatches this length ball away over wide long off. Sweet sound off the bat, and soars over the boundary ropes. Thumped!
good length outside off, opens the bat's face and runs it down to third man
good length on leg stump, clipped off his pads past the square-leg umpire. There's a man in the deep, though
back of a length outside off, stays on the back foot and chops it down to third man for a walking single
back of a length on leg stump, nudged off the back foot towards the leg side. No run on offer
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: good length on middle stump, angling across his body and it's glanced with the bat's open face to the wide third man
tossed up full outside off, big stride forward and driven back to the bowler
items.shortText: Gunathilaka to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: good length on middle and leg, worked off his toes to square leg with ease for a single. Awry throw from the fielder, and a misfield from the bowler allows them to steal a second
items.shortText: Gunathilaka to Mohammad Saifuddin, 2 leg byes

items.text: back of a length outside off, rocks back and punches to mid off
items.shortText: Gunathilaka to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: tossed up outside off again. It's a slower, loopy ball on this occasion. Slapped off the front foot to deep extra cover

items.preText: Hundred runs to win off 86 balls.
items.text: good length outside leg stump, straightens after pitching and goes down the leg side
full on middle and leg, clipped off his boots to square leg for a single
good length on middle and leg, flicked off his pads to deep backward square
low full toss on leg, clipped to backward square leg
back of a length, waits before steering to deep backward point

is that a run out? And more importantly is Gunaratne alright? Saifuddin nudges this one to midwicket and there is total chaos on the single. In the end, Saifuddin sacrifices his wicket but Gunaratne had only one stump to aim at so he charges forward with ball in hand,dives forward and shatters the stumps, hits into the fielder backing up, and then the knee of the batsman, running in at full tilt, strikes the side of his head. But he's alright
